00201         inline void applyAdjustWithClamp(float* pComponent, float adjust)
00202         {
00203             *pComponent += adjust;
00204             // Limit to 0
00205             if (*pComponent < 0.0)
00206             {
00207                 *pComponent = 0.0f;
00208             }
00209             // Limit to 1
00210             else if (*pComponent > 1.0)
00211             {
00212                 *pComponent = 1.0f;
00213             }
00214         }
00215
